definition: angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale

sentences.english: In Chinese mythology, the Licorne is an auspicious objects.
sentences.chinese: 在中國神話中，獨角獸是一種吉祥之物。

sentences.english: Unicorns come from the world of fantasy.
sentences.chinese: 獨角獸是來自於幻想的世界。

sentences.english: "Here, unicorn, " said the man, and he pulled up a lily and gave it to him.
sentences.chinese: 他說獨角獸的前額正中有一隻金色的犄角。

sentences.english: There are many different forms of the Licorne statement.
sentences.chinese: 關於獨角獸的形態有很多不同的說法。

sentences.english: When world peace will be better when Chongxian Licorne.
sentences.chinese: 當世界和平美好時獨角獸將會重現。

sentences.english: Licorne is the legend of a mysterious animal.
sentences.chinese: 獨角獸，是傳說中的一種神祕的動物。
“那隻獨角獸，”他說道，“吃了一朵百合花。”

sentences.english: I'll be a lost glade in which unicorns still play.
sentences.chinese: 我願成爲一片丟失的林中空地，獨角獸在此玩耍。
“去掉獨角獸，”我斬釘截鐵的說。

sentences.english: I often dream about unicorns and dragons.
sentences.chinese: 我常常夢見獨角獸和龍。

sentences.english: "He told me it had a golden horn in the middle of its forehead," she said.
sentences.chinese: 他說獨角獸的前額正中有一隻金色的犄角。

sentences.english: We use unicorn hairs, phoenix tail feathers, and the heartstrings of dragons.
sentences.chinese: 我們使用獨角獸毛，鳳凰尾羽毛，和龍的心絃。

sentences.english: But water is toxic, and they dare not drink until one Licorne there.
sentences.chinese: 但是水是有毒的，它們不敢喝，直至一獨角獸出現。

sentences.english: The Lion beat the Unicorn all around the town.
sentences.chinese: 獅子把獨角獸打得落花流水。

sentences.english: Formidable hybrid of unicorn and Pegasus.
sentences.chinese: 獨角獸和飛馬令人生畏的混血。

definition: variant of 策劃|策划[ce4 hua4]
startup (company, phase etc)/newly established/in the early stages
storm/violent commotion/fig. crisis (e.g. revolution, uprising, financial crisis etc)
different mouths, same voice/to speak in unison (idiom)
to wait for action after having accumulated power, energy etc
